articles.author: Eustance Huang
articles.title: Asia stocks set to fall as investors await reopening of Chinese markets amid virus outbreak
articles.description: Mainland Chinese stocks are set to return to trade at 9:30 a.m. HK/SIN on Monday following an extended holiday amid an ongoing virus outbreak that has taken at least 300 lives in the country so far.
articles.content:
Stocks in Asia were set to decline at the open on Monday as investors await the reopening of China's markets amid an ongoing coronavirus outbreak.
Futures pointed to a lower open for Japanese stocks. The Nikkei futures contract in Chicago was at 22,730 while… [+1831 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus updates: China's Hubei province confirms additional 56 deaths and 2,103 cases
articles.description: The majority of cases have been located in Wuhan, China — the capital city of Hubei province and the epicenter of the coronavirus outbreak.
articles.content:
A woman wears a protective mask to prevent the spread of the SARS-like virus as she walks outside of the Forbidden city (back) after a snowfall in Beijing on February 2, 2020.

articles.author: Stephanie Landsman
articles.title: If coronavirus fears escalate, Wells Fargo warns 10-year Treasury yields could fall another 30%
articles.description: Wells Fargo Securities' Michael Schumacher expects the bond rush to intensify.
articles.content:
Wells Fargo Securities' Michael Schumacher expects the bond rush to intensify.
According to the firm's global head of rate strategy, coronavirus fears will drive more investors into the U.S. Treasury market as a safe haven play and drive yields sharply lower… [+1829 chars]

articles.author: Jacob Pramuk
articles.title: Revolution or return to decency? Democrats' final Iowa arguments show their case against Trump
articles.description: The Iowa closing arguments from Sanders, Biden, Buttigieg and Warren showcase why they think they're the best candidate to beat Trump.
articles.content:
Former Vice President Joe Biden speaks at an event in Marshalltown, Iowa on Jan. 26, 2020 ahead of the Iowa caucuses.
At least four Democrats have a good chance to leave Monday's first-in-the-nation Iowa presidential caucuses with the most delegates.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: OPEC+ technical panel to meet to discuss coronavirus impact, report says
articles.description: The technical panel is likely to make a recommendation on whether to extend current oil supply curbs beyond March or to implement deeper output cuts.
articles.content:
OPEC and non-OPEC's Joint Technical Committee (JTC) has scheduled a meeting over Feb. 4-5 in Vienna to assess the impact of China's new coronavirus on oil demand, OPEC+ sources told Reuters.
 The technical panel is likely to make a recommendation on whether … [+299 chars]

articles.author: Christine Wang
articles.title: Philippines reports first death outside of China in coronavirus outbreak
articles.description: "This is the first reported case outside of China. However, we need to keep in mind that he came from Wuhan, China," Dr. Rabi Abeyasinghe, a World Health Organization representative in the Philippines said in a statement on Twitter.
articles.content:
The Philippines confirmed that a man who tested positive for the new coronavirus died on Saturday.
The man's death comes amid an outbreak of a coronavirus stemming from Wuhan, China. Earlier Sunday, Chinese officials said the virus has claimed 304 lives and … [+501 chars]
